content: squeezebox is an overlay mosaic it s an enjoyable repeating 20x20 pattern that can be used for crocheting blankets of all sizes table bed and dresser runners scarves and other wearables bags rugs and cushion covers please note that the pattern does not explain the fundamentals of crocheting overlay mosaic there are loads of youtube videos and online blogs that you would find more helpful than i can explain **experience level** confident beginner **language & terminology** english us **technique** overlay mosaic crochet in row **pattern repeat** 20+4 for envelope bordered project 20+1 for traditional sewn in ends project **pattern for gauge ** chain 17 turn single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet across cut \*return to beginning standing single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet across cut repeat from \* until you have 16 row **the pattern includes** chart with marked x written pattern **permissions ** you have my permission to sell anything you **make** from my pattern but you do **not** have my permission to sell my pattern you may **not** post any part of this pattern written or chart on any website **need help ** if you have a question please contact me through my ravelry shop indicating what row/row you are having difficulties with you do have to trust the pattern even if you feel it won t be right dive into it and keep going this pattern does have its moments where it doesn t seem right but it is so confident beginners you can do this the yarn i used is worsted weight but you can use any weight yarn you like i suggest making a sample of the full repeat to be sure you re happy with your yarn and hook selection because this is a digital sale no refunds exchanges or cancellations will be given for any reason please contact ravelry if you have any problems locating your order it is your responsibility to know how to navigate to your library and download your purchases
